ratings.question_text: The readings/cases/textbooks used in this course were __________ .
Out-of-class assignments for this course were ___________ to my learning.
The workload for this course in comparison to other courses was ___________.
The pace of this class was ____________ for optimal learning.
Overall, the teaching assistant for this course was accessible, organized, and able to explain concepts clearly and thoroughly.
Field trips were well designed and ran smoothly.
I learned a lot from field trips.
How clearly does the instructor provide explanations of conceptual material?
How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Please identify the teaching assistant with whom you interacted most closely _____________________ .
comments: Instructor: Maria Gabriela Doria Ramirez  She was really helpful in class and in field trip. She helped us how to identify all the families with lots of knowledge.
Instructor: Maria Gabriela Doria Ramirez  Great! Very knowledgeable.
Instructor: Maria Gabriela Doria Ramirez  She was very helpful and put in extra time for review sessions

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-14, if you wish
comments: This class was really awesome!!!!!!!

Class was very good- we all learned a lot about tropical taxonomy. Class started easy (assuming people had little taxonomy background) but accelerated so that everyone was classifying plants by the end.
The field trip was outstanding! I think it would be good to organize another field trip to NYBG before the midterm, or to make more use of Marsh Botanical Garden.

narratives.question_text: What were the best aspects of this course?
comments: Learning practical skills by looking at lots of materials that professors brought to class.
Loved the hands-on aspect that complements lectures.Spring break field trip was incredible -- I learned so much.
The field trip was invaluable for learning the material.
Field trip
The field trip was outstanding. We learned a ton and it was clearly where the instructors were most at home.
Field Trip! So great.
Field trip to Costa Rica

narratives.question_text: What aspects of this course need the most improvement?
comments: I think you should have a quiz after the first 2 weeks to test people on all the vocab.
Nothing

narratives.question_text: Was the relationship between the course lectures and discussion/lab section
comments: Yes
They were great
Yes, effective; no suggestions at this time

narratives.question_text: What were the strengths and weaknesses of your teaching assistant
comments: She was wonderful
Instructor: Maria Gabriela Doria Ramirez  She has good knowledge about all the families that we have learnd in the class. Thus, we can easily get help from her.

Instructor: Maria Gabriela Doria Ramirez  Very helpful; however study sessions often were very long and the approach of letting us lead them, sometimes promoted confusion rather than clarity (esp. when something as specific, detailed, and complex as plant phylogeny and characters). The approach for the last session seemed better, but having what we produced for the review session looked over (approved) by Gabriela first, would have reduced the confusion we sometimes caused each other

narratives.question_text: Discuss, if you wish, how this course fits into your overall program.  (Please feel free to describe how the course relates to your academic background.)
comments: Identifying trees and their characteristics that I have learned from this class are really important skills that I need to persue my career as a forest manager.
This is one of the only applied tropical ecology courses we have on offer so it was very relevant for me.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: I wanted to pick up skills to identify trees and their characteristics. Also, there were lots of recommendations about this class.
Learn about plants

narratives.question_text: Did the knowledge/skills that you gained from the course meet your expectations ?
comments: Yes!!!
Yes!
Yes
Yes
Yes

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: Nothing toshow..

narratives.question_text: For students who might consider taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Try to get familiarized with terminologies that professors present in the first few classes quickly since all the explanations are given by using all those terminologies.
Take it if you can!
Good if you want to learn about plant taxonomy.
Study
Don't NOT go on the trip - much more makes sense during/after. This course is very worth it.
